question: Who has been re-appointed as the MD & CEO of Federal Bank?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has re-appointed Shyam Srinivasan as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the Federal Bank.
The re-appointment has been made with effect from the date of his term end, September 23, 2020 till September 22, 2021. He had taken charge as the MD and CEO of the private sector bank in the year 2010.
